parameters.name: Cookie
parameters.description: Identifier of toolbar; this is the same cookie you specified in ISwAddin::ConnectToSW

parameters.name: ToolbarId
parameters.description: ID of the toolbar as defined in swToolbar_e

parameters.name: DockingState
parameters.description: Docking state of the toolbar as defined in swToolbarDockStatePosition_e

title: ISldWorks.SetToolbarDock2
description: Sets the docking state of the toolbar.
signature:
System.Boolean SetToolbarDock2( 
   System.Int32
Cookie
,
   System.Int32
ToolbarId
,
   System.Int32
DockingState
)

parameters.name: Cookie
parameters.description: Identifier of toolbar; this is the same cookie you specified in ISwAddin::ConnectToSW

parameters.name: ToolbarId
parameters.description: ID of the toolbar as defined in swToolbar_e

parameters.name: DockingState
parameters.description: Docking state of the toolbar as defined in swToolbarDockStatePosition_e

returns: True if the docking state of the toolbar is set, false if not
